Wings: A full pound of hand breaded chicken wings served with korean bbq, buffalo, smoky sweet dry rub, bbq or spicy honey garlic sauce
Chicken Tenders: crispy breaded chicken served buffalo style, smoky sweet dry rub, bbq, korean bbq, spicy honey garlic
Black Bean Quesadilla: fresh veggies, cilantro cheddar jack cheese, toasted cumin and black beans served w/ sour cream & pico de gallo
Fried Pickles: sour and crispy, served with buttermilk ranch
Irish Nachos: house fried potato chips, cheddar, bacon, fresh scallions, jalapenos and sour cream
GoGo Bites: deep fried bites filled with jalapenos, roasted corn, bacon & cream cheese, deep fried and served with BBQ drizzle
Pemi Dip: creamy bacon dip w/ a 3 cheese blend, whole grain mustard, caramelized onion and scallions served w/warm soft pretzel bites

Bowl of Chili: served with cheddar and green onion
Charred Tomato Caprese: fresh mozzarella, charred marinated tomatoes, lemon basil arugula, toasted brioche
Roasted Mushroom Salad: roasted button mushrooms, pickled shallots, goat cheese, arugula tossed in zinfandel vinaigrette
Caesar Wedge: romaine heart, tuscan caesar dressing, aged parmesan, herb croutons

Public House: mozzarella, pesto, feta, sliced tomatoes, roasted garlic, salami
BLT Flatbread: pemi dip base, bacon, tomatoes, romaine lettuce, spicy mayo drizzle
BBQ Chicken Flatbread: ranch, shredded chicken, mozzarella, cheddar, bacon, bbq, onions

subtitle: Served w/house potato chips and a pickle.  Substitute hand cut fries or side caesar wedge salad for $2, truffle fries for $2.50. Add a side caesar wedge salad or a cup of chili or cup of soup to any Sandwich for $4. Substitute a gluten free roll to any sandwich for $2

Chicken Sandwich: grilled chicken w/ cheddar, bacon, lettuce, tomato & onion, garlic aioli. Served on a brioche roll
Lulu's Big Dog: quarter pound hot dog on grilled brioche bun with sautéed peppers & onions, stone ground mustard
Pemi Sliders*: 2 angus beef patties topped with cheddar, bacon, garlic aioli, lettuce & tomato, on grilled brioche.  Served w/hand cut fries
Banh Mi: slow roasted pork, pickled carrots, thin sliced cucumbers, jalapenos & fresh cilantro w/ spicy mayo, served on toasted french roll
Steak Bomb: lean grilled shaved steak, peppers, onions, mushrooms, pepperoni & cheddar with garlic aioli on toasted french roll
Impossible Burger: plant protein based burger served on grilled brioche with lettuce, onion, and tomato

subtitle: Add a side caesar wedge salad or a cup of chili or cup of soup to any meal for $4

Caprese Chicken: marinated grilled chicken, marinated charred tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, fresh herbs & balsamic reduction. Served w/lemon herb orzo salad & veg of the day
Baked Mac & Cheese: cavatappi pasta in three cheese sauce topped with buttered ritz crumbs.
Tom's Chicken Pot Pie: all white meat, carrots, onion, peas, potatoes, topped with golden puff pastry
Shepard's Pie: the Pemi’s twist on a classic - seasoned ground beef in a merlot gravy with carrots, peas and onions topped and baked with roasted garlic mashed potatoes
Beer Battered Fish & Chips: Tuckermans beer battered haddock, hand cut fries, tartar (Friday through Sunday while they last!)
Naan Tacos: adobo pulled chicken, cotija cheese, grilled peppers & onions, corn salsa, micro cilantro, lime sour cream on mini naan
Try it veg style! (sub black beans for chicken)

LA Bourbon Sour: bulleit bourbon, fresh lemon, local maple syrup, luxardo cherry
Sinner: skrewball peanut butter whiskey, pbr hard coffee, reeses puffs, on the rocks
Berry Patch Mule: strawberry or blueberry vodka, ginger beer, soda, fresh lime, touch of grenadine
Dirty Unicorn: cucumber mint vodka, lemonade, tonic, empress indigo gin
Banana Pancakes: banana whiskey, rumchata, cold brew, nutmeg, cinnamon sugar rim
Skinny Margarita: hornitos silver, fresh lime, cointreau (try it with blackberry!)
